text: Milan Fashion Week is a fashion trade show held twice a year in Milan, Italy. Designers showcase autumn/winter collections in February/March and spring/summer collections in September/October. Milan Fashion Week is one of the "Big Four" fashion weeks in the world, along with New York, Paris, and London. == History and Operations == Milan Fashion Week began in 1958 and is organized by the National Chamber of Italian Fashion. == See also == * Fashion week ==References== Category:Fashion
title: Milan Fashion Week
